Confirm the 'Specifications' tab is active with background color #ffffff, border bottom 2px solid #007bff, text 'Specifications', font weight 600, and color #333333
Verify inactive tabs have text color #666666 and font weight 400
Ensure the 'Help' icon's tooltip is hidden by default
Hover over the 'Help' icon
Verify the tooltip becomes visible, displays text 'Contact support for assistance.', has background color #333333, font size 12px, opacity 0.9, and is positioned 5px below the icon
Verify the form label 'Email Address' has font size 14px, color #333333, font weight 500, padding bottom 5px, and is associated with an input element having aria-label 'Email address input'

Check the website footer displays copyright text '© 2023 MyCompany. All rights reserved.' with font size 13px, color #888888, background color #f8f8f8, text alignment center, height 80px, and 20px vertical padding
